----------------------------------------------------------------------
Component: fh-amqp-js
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Release 0.6.0 - 2016-05-19 - Wei Li
* Add support for amqp heartbeat

Release 0.5.0 - 2015-07-09 - Wei Li
* FHMAP-717 - Add support for remote procedure calls (RPC).

Release 0.4.5 - 2015-06-06 - Craig Brookes
* FHMAP-692 - ensure channels close after publish

Release 0.4.4 - 2015-05-28 - Wei Li
* FHMAP-499 - Add new event types for openshift deployment

Release 0.4.3 - 2015-04-29 - FH-164 - Gerard Ryan
* Use grunt instead of make for build lifecycle
* Fix jshint errors
* Use mocha instead of whiskey for tests
* Use istanbul instead of whiskey for coverage

Release 0.4.2 - 2015-04-14 - FH-144 - Gerard Ryan
* Add npm-shrinkwrap.json file to lock dependency versions

Release 0.4.1 - 2015-02-12 - IR246 - Wei Li
* Use hostname instead of host when parsing connection strings.

Release 0.4.0 - 2015-02-06 - IR246 - Wei Li
* 8750 - Improve API and resillence to RabbitMQ failures.

Release 0.3.2 - 2015-01-08 - IR244 - Martin Murphy
------------------------------------------------------
* 8610 - specify dependency versions in package.json (by removing ^)

Release 0.3.1 - 2014-10-29 - IR239 -Wei Li
------------------------------------------------------
* Keep exchange declaration backward compatible.

Release 0.3.0 - 2014-10-29 - IR239 -Wei Li
------------------------------------------------------
* Ticket 8212 - Automatically reconnect to rabbitmq server if it restarts

Release 0.2.4 - 2014-10-13 - IR238 - David Martin
-----------------------------------------------------
* Ticket 8128 - Added task worker publish to fh-amqp-js

Release 0.2.3 - 2014-10-05 - IR238 - Damian Beresford
-----------------------------------------------------
* Ticket 8009 - fh-amqp-js: add millicore related event types
* Ticket 8036 - Added task worker subscribe to fh-amqp-js

Release 0.2.2 - 2014-09-23 - IR237 - Damian Beresford
-----------------------------------------------------
* Ticket 8009 - fh-amqp-js: add millicore related event types

Release 0.2.1 - 2013-09-20 - IR208 - Damian Beresford
-----------------------------------------------------
* Ticket 4741 Additional events needed for Dyno/App Import/Export

Release 0.2.0 - 2013-08-13 - IR208 - Damian Beresford
-----------------------------------------------------
* Ticket 4505 fh-amqp-js.js sub command not working with single cluster node
* Ticekt 4515 fh-amqp-js should export constants for the known event types

Release 0.1.2 - 2013-06-19 - IR204 - Wei Li
-----------------------------------------------
* Update deploy failed event type

Release 0.1.1 - 2013-06-19 - IR204 - Wei Li
-----------------------------------------------
* Move default events into amqp js

Release 0.1.0 - 2013-04-17 - IR199 - Damian Beresford
-----------------------------------------------------

* Ticket 3732 RabbitMQ clustering: new node.js module for FH node services.
